newsitem.title: USA: Seagate not planning conference call.
newsitem.headline: Seagate not planning conference call.

text.p: Seagate Technology Inc said Thursday it has no plans for a conference call with analysts.
Earlier, CNBC reported shares of the disk drive company were down on rumors the company scheduled a conference call with analysts to discuss its business outlook.
However, a spokeswoman for Seagate said rumors of a conference call were untrue.
Seagate was off 2-1/2 to 41-3/4 in New York Stock Exchange trading.
Shares of other disk drive makers were also down in sympathy. Western Digital Corp was off 3-1/4 to 55-7/8.
Stocks of disk drive companies have been pressured by investor fears that disk drive prices will continue to decline.
Seagate also declined to comment on rumors it may reduce production due to fears of oversupply.
